name: Along the stars 560
description:
Small infinite runner for TweetTweetJam 5 I have created to fight a bording week on a Lockdown.

Controlls :

use arrows to move
You gain scores by staing alive.

Whole code you can look at https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?pid=83805 for full source code. And feel free to add comments with your high score ;)
